channel.title: Paradox RS Dung - Soul wars - Nex - Daily Updates - Events
channel.description:
Welcome to Paradox Paradox is a rsps with alot of activites to do within the game! Our server has many things to do so you wont get bored. We always update daily bringing new things and fixes to the game. Also we will take community feedback to implent more things into the game!!
Our cache is server side so loading the client takes literally 20 seconds!
==================================================
Download Our Client : https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78911558/PxV1.jar
==================================================
- Our new minigame soulwars! - 10+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others. - Two custom quests. - Full farming - Dungeoneering with mutliple floors - Summoning with all familiars - Newest/old hit marks (Can be toggled in the option interface) - 5 different slayer masters covering over 96 different Slayer monsters. - Full pest control - Full duel arena - Pk points System - Lottery - Perfect Ancient Curses. - Slayer helm fully working - Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape - Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more. - All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working. - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn. - Active Community with professional forums. - Regular double exp/drops weekend. - Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches. - Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat. - Perfect Switching. - Regular community events & drop parties. - Bank pins - Bank tabs - Tons of minigames - Clan battles - Free for all clan portal
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2s0e53p.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2uiesnq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2e0r144.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/b6r2x5.jpg[/img]

his rep is bad for scamming people Idk about anything else.

item.description:
@luigipwnz12 wrote:

Welcome to Paradox
Paradox is a rsps with alot of activites to do within the game!
Our server has many things to do so you wont get bored. We always update daily bringing new things and fixes to the game. Also we will take community feedback to implent more things into the game!!

Our cache is server side so loading the client takes literally 20 seconds!

==================================================

Download Our Client : https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78911558/PxV1.jar

==================================================

  • Our new minigame soulwars!
  • 10+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others.
  • Two custom quests.
  • Full farming
  • Dungeoneering with mutliple floors
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • Newest/old hit marks (Can be toggled in the option interface)
  • 5 different slayer masters covering over 96 different Slayer monsters.
  • Full pest control
  • Full duel arena
  • Pk points System
  • Lottery
  • Perfect Ancient Curses.
  • Slayer helm fully working
  • Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape
  • Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more.
  • All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working.
  • All npcs have a good variety of drops.
  • Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn.
  • Active Community with professional forums.
  • Regular double exp/drops weekend.
  • Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches.
  • Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat.
  • Perfect Switching.
  • Regular community events & drop parties.
  • Bank pins

  • Clan battles
  • Free for all clan portal
